title: [K-12] Science Education Design Considering Cognitive Differences: Customized Learning Strategies Based on Working Memory

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and familiarity with research methodologies
context.additional_context: Requires flexible lesson design considering differences in learners' working memory capacity. Strengthens experimental data analysis and collaborative learning using personal BYOD devices

learning_goals: Learners can select science problem-solving strategies suited to their working memory capacity and complete experimental design tasks with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze differences in cognitive strategies through peer assessment and develop personalized learning plans at least three times.
Learners can visualize complex scientific data using digital tools (BYOD) and present the interpretation process with over 70% clarity.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
